meanings: suitability, fitness, appropriateness, conformity, agreement, 적합하다 (be) suitable, fit, compatible
suitable (for), fit (for), appropriate (for/to), suited (for/to), good, proper

vlive.korean: [리폼의 취지와 아주 적합] - 리폼이잖아요 리폼 - 기장이 중요해? [That's why you remake clothes] - That's what we'll do. - Does it matter? 듣기 View video BTS : Run BTS! 2020 - EP.104
vlive.english: [That's why you remake clothes] - That's what we'll do. - Does it matter?

vlive.korean: 적합하다고 생각해요? Do you think it suits you? 듣기 View video PLEDIS : [가은/윤진] HAPPY HALLOWEEN 🎃
vlive.english: Do you think it suits you?

vlive.korean: 제 의도와 그러면 적합한... That was exactly my intention. 듣기 View video THE BOYZ : 캎☀️
모델로서 적합합니까? I wonder whether she's a good model. 듣기 View video 콬TV (WHYNOT) : 회의 시간에 갑자기 엉덩이 보여주는 사장님ㅣ[뜻밖의 손님] VLOG #2
vlive.english: I wonder whether she's a good model.

vlive.korean: 이젠 슬리데린이 적합하다고 생각해요. so I think that I fit a Slytherin now. 듣기 View video PLEDIS : [가은/윤진] HAPPY HALLOWEEN 🎃
vlive.english: so I think that I fit a Slytherin now.

examples.korean: The houses were unfit for human habitation. 발음듣기 그 집들은 사람이 거주하기에 적합하지 않았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The houses were unfit for human habitation. 발음

examples.korean: He was, indubitably, the most suitable candidate. 발음듣기 그는 의심할 여지없이 가장 적합한 후보였다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He was, indubitably, the most suitable candidate. 발음

examples.korean: He convinced us of his fitness for the task. 발음듣기 그는 자기가 그 일에 적합함을 우리에게 납득시켰다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He convinced us of his fitness for the task. 발음

examples.korean: There were doubts about her fitness to hold office. 발음듣기 그녀가 직책을 맡는 것이 적합한가에 대해 의구심들이 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: There were doubts about her fitness to hold office. 발음

examples.korean: This land is ripe for development. 발음듣기 이 땅은 개발하기에 적합하다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: This land is ripe for development. 발음
